metadata.title: CVE-2011-1691 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
The counterToCSSValue function in CSSComputedStyleDeclaration.cpp in theCascading Style Sheets (CSS) implementation in WebCore in WebKit beforer82222, as used in Google Chrome before 11.0.696.43 and other products,does not properly handle access to the (1) counterIncrement and (2)counterReset attributes of CSSStyleDeclaration data provided by agetComputedStyle method call, which allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service (NULL pointer dereference and application crash) viacrafted JavaScript code.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2011-1691` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-3.0 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit-3.0 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
gir1.2-webkit2-3.0 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libjavascriptcoregtk-3.0-bin - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libwebkit2gtk-3.0-25 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-1.0-0 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-1.0-common - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-3.0-0 - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
libwebkitgtk-3.0-common - 2.4.9-2ubuntu2
No subscription required

chromium-browser - 14.0.835.202~r103287-0ubuntu1
chromium-browser-l10n - 14.0.835.202~r103287-0ubuntu1
chromium-chromedriver - 14.0.835.202~r103287-0ubuntu1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg - 14.0.835.202~r103287-0ubuntu1
chromium-codecs-ffmpeg-extra - 14.0.835.202~r103287-0ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkitgtk package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.4.9-2ubuntu2').
qtwebkit-source: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
chromium-browser package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '14.0.835.202~r103287-0ubuntu1').
